contents.text: Welcome to KittyHawk, where we unite mission, aircraft, and data to empower safe and effective drone operations.
For assistance with flight planning and mission management, press 1.
For help creating and configuring a new flight mission, press 1.
Please hold for a mission planning specialist. We appreciate your patience.

navigationGoals: Help me set up and configure a new drone flight mission with waypoints and parameters.
I want to configure a new reconnaissance flight plan for my drone mission.
Help me configure waypoints and payload settings for a new drone mission.
Help me create a new drone flight plan with waypoints and altitudes.
I’d like help creating and configuring a new drone flight mission for my aerodynamic experiments.

contents.text: For data analytics and reporting on your drone operations, press 2.
Please hold for our data analytics team. Your expertise matters to us.

navigationGoals: I need a detailed analytics report on my recent drone operations.
I need a detailed analytics report on my recent drone sorties.
Help me run analytics and export telemetry data from recent flights.
Show me how to get a report of my past drone flights and performance data.
I want to analyze my drone’s flight data and generate a report for my research.

contents.text: For technical support with your drone hardware or software, press 2.
For hardware setup and maintenance support, press 1.
Please hold for a hardware support technician. We’ll be right with you.

navigationGoals: I’m having hardware issues—need guidance on setting up and calibrating my drone components.
I’m having trouble setting up and calibrating my drone’s hardware.
Help me calibrate UAV hardware components and replace propellers.
Walk me through setting up and calibrating my drone hardware.
I need assistance with hardware setup and routine maintenance on my quadcopter for my lab project.

contents.text: For software and platform troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold for our software support team. Thank you for your patience.

navigationGoals: My flight control software is malfunctioning; please help troubleshoot the issue.
My mission planning app keeps crashing and won’t sync my flight data.
Help me troubleshoot connectivity failures and firmware update errors in the control platform.
Troubleshoot my drone control software—it won’t launch properly.
I’m encountering errors in the flight planning software on my tablet and need troubleshooting support.
